p.package_no, p.type, p.hall, p.studio, p.dress, p.makeup, p.discount,
h.product_name AS hall_name, h.address AS hall_address, h.cost AS hall_cost, h.img AS hall_img,
s.product_name AS studio_name, s.cost AS studio_cost,
d.product_name AS dress_name, d.cost AS dress_cost,
m.product_name AS makeup_name, m.cost AS makeup_cost,
NVL(h.cost,0)+NVL(s.cost,0)+NVL(d.cost,0)+NVL(m.cost,0) AS total_price, NVL(h.cost,0)+NVL(s.cost,0)+NVL(d.cost,0)+NVL(m.cost,0) - NVL(p.discount,0) AS final_price
FROM package p LEFT JOIN product h ON h.product_no = p.hall LEFT JOIN product s ON s.product_no = p.studio LEFT JOIN product d ON d.product_no = p.dress LEFT JOIN product m ON m.product_no = p.makeup
